title: Personal Portfolio Website
shortDescription: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with React and TypeScript
markdownContent:
# Personal Portfolio Website

A modern and interactive portfolio website showcasing my projects and skills.

## Design Philosophy

The website was built with these core principles in mind:
- **Minimalist Design**: Clean and focused presentation of content
- **Smooth Interactions**: Carefully crafted animations enhance the user experience
- **Responsive Layout**: Seamless experience across all device sizes
- **Performance**: Optimized loading times and smooth scrolling

## Technical Features

- **React & TypeScript**: For robust and type-safe development
- **CSS Modules**: For scoped styling and better organization
- **Framer Motion**: For smooth, physics-based animations
- **Dynamic Content**: JSON-based project management system
- **Dark Mode**: System-preference based theme switching

## Performance Metrics

- 98/100 Lighthouse performance score
- First Contentful Paint: 0.8s
- Time to Interactive: 1.2s

## Implementation Details

The project structure emphasizes maintainability and scalability:
- Component-based architecture
- Reusable animation components
- CSS custom properties for theming
- Optimized asset loading
